name: MedicinalProductAuthorization.validityPeriod
title: MedicinalProductAuthorization.validityPeriod
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The beginning of the time period in which the marketing authorization is in the specific status shall be specified A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format
element.definition: The beginning of the time period in which the marketing authorization is in the specific status shall be specified A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format.
